name: Tactical Chef
description:
Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Left Click/Ctrl to fire
  • 1,2,3 to change weapon

Made for the Ludum Dare 41 challenge under the theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres".

The ultimate combination, shooters and cooking! After this game, you'll never want to cook in any other way again!

Learn how to make a delicious plate of pasta utilizing a new set of skills and powers!

  • A flamethrower!
  • Floating ingredients!
  • Beautiful graphics!
  • Educational!*

*Results may vary
